TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed IDLFLAG extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes how to transfer a structure element, parameter, or function return value between processes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDLFLAG IDLFLAG_FIN = int16(1)

Docs.summary: The parameter passes information from the caller to the callee.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDLFLAG IDLFLAG_FLCID = int16(4)

Docs.summary: The parameter is the local identifier of a client application.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDLFLAG IDLFLAG_FOUT = int16(2)

Docs.summary: The parameter returns information from the callee to the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDLFLAG IDLFLAG_FRETVAL = int16(8)

Docs.summary: The parameter is the return value of the member.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IDLFLAG IDLFLAG_NONE = int16(0)

Docs.summary: Does not specify whether the parameter passes or receives information.
